name: Orbital Ballistics
description:
The classic ballistics game but in the solar system!

The player planets colony has to destroy the enemy planets with inter-planetary nukes!

Now with:

  • Random planetary systems
  • Better AI
  • Better collisions
  • Better distruction
  • Rocket interception
  • A simple menu
  • Rocket trajectory preview

Future goal is a multiplayer game-play.

Controls:

Use the mouse to select and lunch rockets (right click to abort lunch) and the key p to zoom in and m to zoom out. Press esc to pause the game.

Follow the development here : https://github.com/Mandarancio/Planetary-Ballistic...
